ai-kv18.7:1.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.7:2.3_0: in the second jhāna and the third absorption are in two jhānas.
ai-kv18.7:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.7:3.3_0: the third absorption and the fourth jhāna are in between the two jhānas.
ai-kv18.7:3.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.7:4.1_0: in the second jhāna and the third absorption there is no obstruction.
ai-kv18.7:4.3_0: If you’re being struck with the second absorption, you can’t live in jhāna, while you’re not a terminator.
ai-kv18.7:5.1_0: in the third jhāna and the fourth jhāna, there is no obstruction.
ai-kv18.7:5.3_0: ‘On the third absorption one, while the fourth absorption are precisely abiding in absorption, Revata do not proceed  because of this.
ai-kv18.7:6.1_0: the first absorption and the second absorption are in two jhānas.
ai-kv18.7:6.3_0: in the second jhāna and the third absorption are in two jhānas.
ai-kv18.7:6.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.7:7.1_0: the first absorption and the second absorption are in two jhānas.
ai-kv18.7:7.3_0: the third absorption and the fourth jhāna are in between the two jhānas.
ai-kv18.7:7.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.7:8.1_0: in the second jhāna and the third absorption there is no obstruction.
ai-kv18.7:8.3_0: the first jhāna and the second absorption are no in between jhānas.
ai-kv18.7:8.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.7:9.1_0: in the third jhāna and the fourth jhāna, there is no obstruction.
ai-kv18.7:9.3_0: the first jhāna and the second absorption are no in between jhānas.
ai-kv18.7:9.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.7:10.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. ...
ai-kv18.7:10.3_0: Immersion with placing the mind and keeping it connected is the bare stilling.
ai-kv18.7:10.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.7:11.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. ...
ai-kv18.7:11.3_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Imersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected.’
ai-kv18.7:11.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.7:12.1_0: Immersion with placing the mind and keeping it connected are not stilled.
ai-kv18.7:12.3_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. ...
ai-kv18.7:12.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.7:13.1_0: without placing the mind and keeping it connected is without placing the mind, but without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
ai-kv18.7:13.3_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. ...
ai-kv18.7:13.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.7:14.1_0: in the two jhānas accompanied by applied thought is the sustained thought which has been undertaken in between the two jhānas, and is accompanied by applied thought.
ai-kv18.7:14.5_0: But while placing the mind and keeping it connected are stilled, I entered the first absorption, so I entered and remained in the second absorption, which has Revatavable, not could be told:
ai-kv18.7:14.6_0: “One from two absorptions has arisen in the next life.”
ai-kv18.7:15.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. ...
ai-kv18.7:15.3_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. ...
ai-kv18.7:15.4_0: They enter and remain in the second absorption ...
ai-kv18.7:15.7_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv18.7:15.8_0: Therefore therefore it is applied thought and sustained thought only.
ai-kv18.7:16.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. ...
ai-kv18.7:16.3_0: Didn’t the Buddha have said that
ai-kv18.7:16.4_0: “Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected.”
ai-kv18.7:16.6_0: The Buddha has spoken of three kinds of concentration:
ai-kv18.7:16.8_0: they should say this beliefted, but don’t practice concentration.”
ai-kv18.7:16.9_0: “Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected.”
ai-kv18.7:16.10_0: The account of the absorptions, etc. is finished.
